debug_audio_queue.description: Logs messages when the audio queue is empty (e.g., 'Queue empty, waiting for audio data...').

debug_audio_callback.description: Logs detailed audio callback information, such as raw amplitude and dB levels.

debug_audio_processing.description: Logs audio processing steps, such as retrieving audio data and feeding it to the Vosk recognizer.

debug_transcription.description: Logs transcription results, including partial and final transcriptions (e.g., 'Transcribed: Hello').

debug_commands.description: Logs command detection and execution (e.g., 'Detected command: stop listening').

debug_status_updates.description: Logs status updates, such as 'Loading Vosk model...' and 'Audio stream started successfully.' These are also shown in the GUI status bar.
